languages.text: "Странный ксенос-поэт говорит так непонятно... Хорошо, что мы поняли главное — он отведет нас к тебе".
"That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."
languages.original_text: "Странный ксенос-поэт говорит так непонятно... Хорошо, что мы поняли главное — он отведет нас к тебе".

traits.locale_text: "That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you, and it was the part that mattered."
"That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you, and it was the part that mattered."
"That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and it was the part that mattered."
"That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and it was the part that mattered."
"That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."
"That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."

languages.text: « Ce poète xénos manie les mots très étrangement... Mais nous avons réussi à comprendre qu'il voulait nous aider à vous retrouver, et c'est la seule chose qui comptait à nos yeux. »
languages.original_text: "That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."

traits.locale_text: « Ce poète xénos manie les mots très étrangement... Mais nous avons réussi à comprendre qu'il voulait nous aider à vous retrouver, et c'est la seule chose qui comptait à nos yeux. »

languages.text: “那位古怪的异形诗人，以如此奇妙的方式颂唱着文字……我们破译了最后的部分，意识到他想带我们来找你，这才是最重要的事情。”
languages.original_text: "That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."

traits.locale_text: “那位古怪的异形诗人，以如此奇妙的方式颂唱着文字……我们破译了最后的部分，意识到他想带我们来找你，这才是最重要的事情。”

languages.text: 「あの奇妙な異種族の詩人は、実に不可解な話し方をするのです。ただ、彼が私たちをあなたのところへ案内するという大事な部分は聞き取れました」
languages.original_text: "That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."

traits.locale_text: 「あの奇妙な異種族の詩人は、実に不可解な話し方をするのです。ただ、彼が私たちをあなたのところへ案内するという大事な部分は聞き取れました」

languages.text: "Dieser merkwürdige Xenos-Poet geht so unerklärlich geschickt mit Worten um ... Wenigstens konnten wir den Teil entschlüsseln, der uns zu Euch bringen wollte, und das war der entscheidende Teil."
languages.original_text: "That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser merkwürdige Xenos-Poet geht so unerklärlich geschickt mit Worten um ... Wenigstens konnten wir den Teil entschlüsseln, der uns zu Euch bringen wollte, und das war der entscheidende Teil."

languages.text: «Ese poeta xenos tan peculiar tiene un desconcertante don de la palabra... Al menos pudimos descifrar la parte en la que se ofrecía a guiarnos hasta usted, y esa era la parte que importaba».
languages.original_text: "That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."

traits.locale_text: «Ese poeta xenos tan peculiar tiene un desconcertante don de la palabra... Al menos pudimos descifrar la parte en la que se ofrecía a guiarnos hasta usted, y esa era la parte que importaba».

languages.text: "Şu acayip şair zenonun kendini ifade ediş şekli, insanı hayrete düşürüyor... Neyse ki en azından bizi senin yanına götüreceğini söylediği kısmı çözebildik. Önemli olan buydu."
languages.original_text: "That peculiar xenos poet has such a mystifying way with words... At least we deciphered the part about him taking us to you and that was the part that mattered."

traits.locale_text: "Şu acayip şair zenonun kendini ifade ediş şekli, insanı hayrete düşürüyor... Neyse ki en azından bizi senin yanına götüreceğini anlattığı kısmı çözebildik; asıl önemli olan da buydu."
